⚠️ WIZZ SITE AND APP MAINTENANCE ⚠️
Travellers, listen up: our site and app will be down between 4 October 23:00 CET and 5 October 04:00 CET. Please check in online in time and print out your pass or check in for free at the airport if you're travelling during the outage.

data.text: @biciclown Hi there, we apologize that you felt that WIZZ let you down on this occasion. We are doing our best to improve our customer experience and would like to learn more about where we fell short this time. We suggest you submit a complaint via the link: https://t.co/goYYi8Y6DI.

data.text: @ogmojigoji Our colleagues make sure to reply in the 30 days timeframe after your last sent email. If you didn't receive any e-mails within this timeframe, please reach via our live chat channel and our colleagues will inform you. https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

data.text: @vintagepearl70 Hi there, we advise you to contact us via our Live Chat service which is available for 0-24 hours. Here is the link: https://t.co/th7YMTeRwK

@IanA_Tilro Hi. Due to a busy summer season there may be delays in receiving responses from our customer relations team. However, without exception, all registered claims will be answered and processed as soon as possible. We thank you for your patience and understanding with this.

data.text: @paolofumai Hi, you can track your flight's live status via this link: https://t.co/0Si8WWvQIq We're sorry about the caused inconviniences.
@trekwithtony Hi. The Membership owner has to be the lead passenger all times.

@jifa Hi. Please try using a different device. We'd suggest to use a computer or laptop with the newest version of Google Chrome browser as the site is optimalized to that. You can also try clearing your browser history and cookies as those might also affect the website.
